{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/title|make_preferred}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | num=1 | since=fs_ts | 1=
path&amp; make_preferred()
}}
{{dcl end}}

Converts all directory separators in path to the preferred directory separator.

For example, on systems, where {{tt|\}} is the preferred separator, the path {{tt|foo/bar}} will be converted to {{tt|foo\bar}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}
